name: Remote Detonation
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You charge an object no heavier than 20 pounds with an intense amount of fire magic. This magic is loosed when you spend 1 AP to detonate it, when the object is destroyed, or when the object is in the area of another Remote Detonation spell.

When you detonate the object or it is caught in another Remote Detonation spell, every creature within 10 feet of the object must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d10 fire damage, halved on a success.

If the object is destroyed, the fire magic is disrupted. Creatures within 5 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 4d10 fire damage, halved on a success.

The spell harmlessly dissipates after 24 hours.
empower: Choose one - targets three objects with a range of 30 feet, or detonation explosion radius increased to 20 feet and damage increased to 8d12.
